body.name: Podcast Equipment Bundle, BM-800 Condenser with Voice Changer, Recording Studio Package - Podcast Microphone Bundle for Laptop, Streaming/Live Broadcast/YouTube Recording (AM200-V8)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 15 hrs 13 mins
features: 🎤【Great Podcast Equipment Bundle】The Podcast Equipment Bundle is equipped with black BM-800 microphone, Mic adjustable suspension scissor arm stand, Shock Mount, Pop filter, Anti-wind foam Cap, Power cable, V8 sound card. This recording studio package was designed for podcasting, streaming and recording music and short video. What you get is a complete set of podcast microphone bundle.

🎤【Excellent Sound Quality】The condenser microphone bundle has been designed with 2021 professional sound chipset, ensuring your voice is captured in high detail. The cardioid pickup pattern is more suitable for recording podcasts, vocals and other voice works. The condenser microphone records the sound source in front of the microphone directly and provides a rich, mellow sound.

🎤【High Compatibility Podcast Kit】The recording studio equipment can be used in most mainstream operating systems such as Windows and Mac OS, in addition, the voice changer is compatible with smartphones (Android and IOS). This audio interface can be used on any mobile phone, computer, tablet iPad, PS4, Xbox, Switch and any game platform.

🎤【Functional Recording Studio Package】This voice changer has multiple sound effects. You can connect to different devices (computer/ mobile phone/ laptop) by using different connection methods. Change your voice anytime, anywhere, call with friends, chat on for WeChat, live and sing, take video on TikTok, Youtube, etc. The podcast equipment bundle will bring more fun to you and make your recording more creative.

🎤【100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】After you get the studio microphone bundle, please charge it first. We are a company dedicated to the research and development of podcast kit, we provide 12 months warranty, and 40 days no reason to return, if you have any questions in the process of use, please contact us in time, we will solve any problems for you within 12 hours.

How to charge condenser microphone bundle? It is recommended to charge the music recording equipment for more than 4 hours before using it. This Podcast Microphone Bundle is equipped with a USB-B data cable and charged with DC 5V. Compatible with most 5V / 1-2A USB outlets. V8 sound card cannot be opened 1. Before use, it is recommended to charge it for about 4 hours. 2. Press and hold the power button for more than 3 seconds until the indicator light in the upper right corner turns flashing. Condenser Microphone doesn't work 1. Check whether the connection part is installed firmly. 2. Plug and unplug the microphone and V8 sound card again. 3. Before working with the mobile phone or computer, connect earphone to the "earphone" jack to test the microphone works normally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did not want to buy this but it was needed for a project. I'm an old audio engineer from 1980s and I was a real snob when he came to sub-par audio gear. It wasn't Shure, Yamaha , Altec or Crown it was crap. I had zero expectations!First off: the mic stand is decent, looks good, and functions; I wish it had a standard threading.The Mic: For a condenser mic, it works really well; it has a nice warm tone. Like all condenser microphones, it has horrible background noise pick up, unless of course you like that kind of stuff.Now the mixer board: I like it! It works with two cell phones (one iphone, other android) and my Mac Mini with background from a iPad. The cables are crap but work. It is nowhere near a professional piece of equipment but it works well; there's some buzzes but it seems to hold on and not drop out. The effects and voice changer are cool too. If you are thinking about starting a podcast this would be a good 1st date.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this item to start my podcast. I will say it is a great product to use when starting a podcast. I did have an issue with my mic. When it was addressed they quickly sent me a new item. It came very quick and I was still able to do my upcoming interview on time. I have not had a problem with the new one. I ;love the quality. My podcast comes out clear, no breaking up. Great product for the price. It does not break your pocket and you can easily learn how to work it. I would purchase again if I needed to. I have not had experience with gaming so I did not put a rating there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Mic with a Bad Soundcard
reviews.reviewText: The microphone and arm set up is quite great all on its own and works with your typical mic jack slot. The only downside to this purchase is the soundboard that they throw in with this mic. It's a cheap board that you can find online elsewhere on its own. There is a good amount of static that comes through both your mic and headset when using its ports and the wires included seem to break easy internally. Overall would be mediocre if not good if not for its connectivity issues. But if you're just looking for a mic and this product is on sale, then by all means, get it for the mic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worthless waste of money
reviews.reviewText: The microphone records sound at such a pitifully low volume it is almost unusable completely. Add a boost through Windows Sound settings? No effect, volume still too low. Purchase a separate 48v power supply to ensure it has the power it needs? No effect, volume still too low. Download and use 3rd party software to boost the volume during the recording process? No effect, volume still too low. Bypass the useless v8 soundcard and connect directly to PC? No effect, volume still too low.This has been a frustrating experience trying to get this thing to be usable and it just isn't. Absolute trash. Much regret.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for starters in the podcast world
reviews.reviewText: this is a good starters set ....if you are wanting to get into podcast ...radio broadcasting....or everyday use..... the mixer board that comes with it is a joke and quit working a week later thankfully i have an actual mixer board to power the mic .....this is a hit or miss item you are taking a chance on it failing fast ....but mic and boom arm that holds the mic are great just that shady mixer that comes with it ......didnt even have the same sound effects that was shown in the product pics ........i cant say this is an item to avoid but there are better options to look into

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good will update in time.
reviews.reviewText: So far so good works as described functions as described. I guess it's kind of luck of the draw. I did not have any of the mentioned background noise or static or anything like that. I also didn't have any problems with the mic not being loud enough. It comes through nice crisp and clear so it's replacing my 8-year-old bm800 that I got forever ago and was running without an amp and this sounds significantly better than that and that Mic sounded good according to everybody. So I say give it a shot with Amazon's return policy and how good of a deal this is I think it's worth it if you get a bad one either refund your money or try switching it out for another one cuz I believe if you get a working one you'll be happy.Qualities decent the materials are decent I mean it's obviously cheap but the arm is amount could be better it just is a c-clamp with like a pivoting dish on top of it so I had to use a piece of 1x1 to to be able to mount it to my desk which is fine. Literally the only thing that I was sad to see was how short the microphone cable was which isn't an issue I've got a 6 ft cord from my old mic but for people that don't have one laying around could cause some sort of limitations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son and he was so excited. He uses it daily to record his music. G worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This wasn't compatible for my Mac book and you can yell it's cheaply made. One fumble and it's over for this studio. Lesson learned to just invest in the good ish.

Llegó antes de lo planeado,está bien que incluya una interfaz de sonido pero los botones y las perillasse sienten que van a romper pero quitando eso la verdad está bastante bueno el producto si recién estás empezando en los podcast, streamings y o producción músical está bastante bueno y fácil de montar y usar
Very bad sound quality and noise .Also send wrong item.I got different item.(You can not return it.)It like a toy.

reviews.reviewerName: Just got this for my son, a fantastic product, highly recommend 👍
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At first wasn't really sure if I should get this product, but honestly I wish I got it sooner it's easily the best thing I got in a long time, I don't think I've laughed so hard making a video with my son, it's a game changer, recommend to all small creators 👍
Buen precio, no lo he usado, pero que funcione, un proveedor me quedo mal, espero que este producto si funcione...
